long_description: When chilly winter winds come howling in, you don't want just any hat on your head. The REI Colorblock Aviator will keep you warm and have you standing out in a crowd with its fun look. Polyester/wool exterior combines with acrylic tweed earflaps for a fun look. Polyester/wool exterior is lined with soft polyester fleece that enhances warmth and wicks moisture away from your brow. Front flap and earflaps are lined with silky soft polyester faux fur for next-to-skin comfort. REI Colorblock Aviator hat features polyester-insulated earflaps that offer protection from harsh winds; secure flaps around your chin or atop your head.
short_description: When chilly winter winds come howling in, you don't want just any hat on your head. The REI Colorblock Aviator will keep you warm and have you standing out in a crowd with its fun look.
